howTo.heading: How can I use filedropshare to send huge files form Iphone to windows?
steps: Just press the Add File button and select your files for transfer from iPhone to Windows.
FileDropShare will generate a URL link and a scan code for your file.
The last step is to share this URL or scan the code on Windows.

faqs.question: Can I use filedropshare offline?
